content: Go left, at the first lava stream you can see running from the ceiling. Take another left, so you're heading back on yourself (just on the lower level) toward where you started Furnace Valley.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Go left, at the first lava stream you can see running from the ceiling. Take another left, so you're heading back on yourself (just on the lower level) toward where you started Furnace Valley.
